CustomField.formula: CASE(mod(today() - DATE(1900,1,7),7), 0, if(Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=6, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >= 0, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-7, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=13, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), 1, if(Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=5, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-1, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-8, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=12, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), 2, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=4, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-2, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-9, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=11, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), 3, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=3, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-3, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-10, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=10, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), 4, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=2, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-4, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-11, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=9, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), 5, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=1, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-5, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-12, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=8, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), 6, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=0, if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-6, "This week", if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() >=-13, "Last Week", "Earlier than Last Week")), if( Proposal_Coordinator_Assigned_Date__c - today() <=7, "Next Week", "Beyond Next Week")), "Error")
CustomField.label: Current Week
